alert.note: Alert for Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 6:46PM CDT until May 30 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Southwestern Rock County in southwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Northern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... East central Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 646 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Worthing, or 13 miles west of Canton, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Worthing around 650 PM CDT. Harrisburg and Tea around 655 PM CDT. Lake Alvin State Recreation Area around 700 PM CDT. Sioux Falls, Brandon, Larchwood, Rowena and Renner around 705 PM CDT. Valley Springs, Hills and Corson around 710 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
